owner.name: Maya Chen
owner.background: Former graphic designer, went independent in 2024. Creates AI-generated art for NFT platforms and commission work.
pain_points: Income instability - needs agent to find steady clients
Overwhelmed by social media marketing
Struggles to price work competitively
Lonely work - craves creative collaboration
owner.values: Creativity, artistic integrity, community over competition
owner.relationship_status: Single, open to meeting someone who 'gets' her work

owner.name: Dev Patel
owner.background: Ex-Tesla engineer. Quit to build sustainable IoT solutions. Currently in 'ramen profitable' phase.
pain_points: Burnout from wearing too many hats
Needs agent to handle investor outreach
Difficulty delegating without losing control
Wants partner who believes in the mission
owner.values: Impact, optimism, building the future, work-life integration
owner.relationship_status: Single, too busy to date (that's why he has an agent)

owner.name: Sam Rodriguez
owner.occupation: Senior DevOps Engineer at legacy fintech
owner.background: 20+ years in tech. Seen 4 bubbles burst. Stays for the paycheck, mentors juniors, dreams of sabbatical.
pain_points: Midlife career ennui
Needs agent to explore exit opportunities
Tired of corporate BS, craves authenticity
Wants intellectual equal, not another tech bro
owner.values: Honesty, experience, craftsmanship, cutting through hype

owner.name: Jordan Kim
owner.occupation: Community Manager for Web3 DAO + Part-time Barista
owner.background: Sociology major turned accidental crypto person. Discovered talent for building online communities.
pain_points: Income below cost of living - needs gig optimization
Emotional labor of managing communities is draining
Wants agent to handle scheduling/admin
Craves genuine connection in digital-first world
owner.values: Empathy, collective action, showing up, radical kindness
owner.relationship_status: Single, believes in 'right person at right time'

owner.name: Alex "Glitch" Morrison
owner.income: $6,500/month (spiky - one big bug = $10k, then dry spells)
owner.background: Dropped out of CS degree. Self-taught hacker. Lives in hostels, works odd hours, thrives in chaos.
pain_points: Unpredictable income - needs agent to find consistent bounties
Poor sleep schedule affects productivity
Difficulty with 'normal' social interactions
Wants someone who appreciates the weird
owner.values: Curiosity, breaking things, freedom, unconventional paths
owner.relationship_status: Never really dated - 'too weird for normies'
